title: SUNNY 2BR RUSSIAN HILL APT
map_address: Greenwich near Polk and Van Ness
posting_body: Second floor unit facing South at rear of property
Walk in closet in each bedroom
No on-site laundry facilities (2 laundromats within 2 blocks)
Located on the border of Russian Hill and Cow Hollow.

The famous Crookedest Street in the World is a mere 3 blocks away; a 5 block walk will take you to the beach at Aquatic Park with San Francisco Bay, Alcatraz, and the Golden Gate Bridge as a backdrop.

Convenient access to the Bay Trail, a scenic walkers/joggers/bicyclists trail that stretches from Oracle Park (Giants Stadium) along the Embarcadero (water front), Marina Green, Crissy Beach, and to the Golden Gate Bridge.

Close to MUNI bus stops with convenient access to the Financial District and Downtown; steps away from trendy Polk Street restaurants, coffee houses and shops; walking distance to Fort Mason, Ghirardelli Square, the Cannery, and Fisherman's Wharf; close to Union Street and Marina District shops, restaurants, and boutiques; neighborhood grocery stores, fitness centers, and hardware store nearby.
